meanings.definition: capable of being seen or watched
meanings.sent1: The colorful flowers in the garden are viewable from the window.
meanings.sent2: The movie was viewable on the big screen at the cinema.
meanings.sent3: The viewable stars in the night sky twinkled like tiny diamonds.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness was viewable to everyone through her bright smile.
meanings.sent5: The viewable rainbow after the rain brought joy to all who saw it.

meanings.definition: able to be displayed or shown
meanings.sent1: The viewable paintings in the art gallery attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent2: The viewable products on the website were easy to browse.
meanings.sent3: The viewable photos on the wall told a story of a memorable vacation.
meanings.sent4: His talent was viewable to all who watched him perform on stage.
meanings.sent5: The viewable exhibit at the museum showcased local artists' work beautifully.
